prompt: Is there a Windows application for live translation during calls in Google Meet or other meetings?

software for live transcription and translation in video calls Windows translate captions in Zoom Meet Teams
metadata.generated_search_query: Windows application live translation during calls Google Meet or other meetings Windows real time translation

citation_mappings.claim_text: Yes — there are Windows apps and tools that provide live translation (captions/subtitles or voice) during calls in Google Meet and other meeting apps: ✅ Built-in Options (no extra app needed, but platform-specific) Google Meet has its own live caption + translation feature built in (translations show as captions in chosen languages). Fora Soft

sources.title: JotMe - Live Translator & AI Interpreter
sources.snippet: JotMe is the most popular live AI translator for meetings. Real-time contextual translation, multilingual transcription, and AI note taking in any language.

citation_mappings.claim_text: These work without a separate Windows application, but may require enabling in settings or a paid plan. ✅ Third-party Windows apps/tools for live translation across meetings These run on Windows and work with Google Meet, Zoom, Teams, etc. 1) JotMe Desktop app for Windows. Captures audio and provides real-time translation + transcription in your chosen languages. Works across meetings without needing a bot. JotMe
2) Talo AI Real-time AI translator that integrates with Google Meet, Teams, Zoom. Translates speech live into captions during calls. Talo

sources.title: AI Translation Agent | Live Multilingual Meetings Made Easy
sources.snippet: The Wordly AI Translation Agent connects to Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Google Meet, and Webex. Delivers live AI translation, captions, transcripts, and summaries.Read more

citation_mappings.claim_text: 3) Wordly AI / Wordly Translation Agent A bot/app that can join meetings and provide live captions and translated subtitles across platforms. Wordly
4) Transync AI Windows desktop translator that captures audio from any meeting and displays translated text/voice. 同言翻译
5) Akkadu AI Live Captions Windows software for live captioning and translation in many languages on any platform. Akkadu
